en.codex: The Gorgon Wraith is a powerful variant of its precursor that features unique styling.
en.description: The Gorgon Wraith is the Wraith upgrade to the Gorgon, featuring a slight increase in damage, accuracy, and fire rate, while sacrificing Puncture and Slash damage. Compared to the Prisma Gorgon, it does slightly more damage per hit but has generally lower stats. It is a powerful Grineer light machine gun with a rapid fire rate and a huge magazine.

ru.description: Горгона Призрак - усиленный вариант оригинальной модели, с уникальным дизайном.
